0: A RESOLUTION DECLARING JULY 15 OF EVERY YEAR AS "NATIONAL SMOKE-FREE DAY" UPON WHICH ALL CITIZENS SHALL BE PROHIBITED TO SMOKE AND PRESCRIBING PENALTIES FOR VIOLATION THEREOF

FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DECLARING JULY 15 OF EVERY YEAR AS "NATIONAL SMOKE-FREE DAY" UPON WHICH ALL CITIZENS SHALL BE PROHIBITED TO SMOKE AND PRESCRIBING PENALTIES FOR VIOLATION THEREOF
